quality_assessment: Subsection is severely incomplete - only contains a single paragraph about documentation versioning without any actual implementation details, setup instructions, or usage examples

issues.description: Documentation claims versioning is supported but provides no details on how it works or how to use it
issues.fix_suggestion: Add comprehensive documentation covering: version selector UI component, deployment workflow, and version-aware book workflow based on the three specs (154, 155, 156)

issues.description: No setup instructions for version selector UI component
issues.fix_suggestion: Document how to integrate version selector into mdBook projects: adding theme files (version-selector.js, version-selector.css), updating book.toml, creating versions.json

issues.description: No documentation on how to configure versioned documentation deployment with GitHub Actions
issues.fix_suggestion: Document GitHub Actions workflow setup: tag-triggered builds, version-specific deployment, versions.json generation, /latest/ pointer management

issues.description: No documentation on making book workflows version-aware with VERSION parameter
issues.fix_suggestion: Document how to enhance book-docs-drift.yml with VERSION support: env var configuration, version-scoped analysis directories, version metadata inclusion

issues.description: No documentation of versions.json file structure and format
issues.fix_suggestion: Document versions.json schema with example showing version, path, label, and released fields

issues.description: No code examples showing how version selector works or how to deploy versioned docs
issues.fix_suggestion: Add examples: book.toml configuration, versions.json creation, GitHub Actions workflow configuration, manual deployment commands

issues.description: No explanation of how versioned documentation architecture works
issues.fix_suggestion: Document the two-branch architecture (main with tags, gh-pages with version directories), deployment flow, and URL structure

issues.description: Documentation doesn't clarify that versioning features are in draft/unimplemented status (all 3 specs are status: draft)
issues.should_be: Prodigy is designing versioned documentation deployment (Specs 154, 155, 156 in draft status)
issues.fix_suggestion: Add clear status indicator showing this is a planned/draft feature, reference the three specs, and indicate what's implemented vs planned

issues.description: No best practices for version retention, cleanup, or managing multiple documentation versions
issues.fix_suggestion: Document version retention strategy: keeping all major versions, last N minor versions, cleanup scripts, storage considerations

issues.description: No troubleshooting section for common versioning issues
issues.fix_suggestion: Add troubleshooting section covering: version selector not appearing, broken version links, deployment failures, version not updating

positive_aspects: Introduces the concept of versioned documentation clearly
Mentions the use case (users on different software releases)
improvement_suggestions: Expand dramatically from current 1 paragraph to comprehensive multi-section guide
Include visual diagrams showing version selector UI and deployment architecture
Add step-by-step tutorial for setting up versioned documentation
Provide complete example configurations for all components
Clearly indicate current implementation status (draft specs, not yet implemented)
Add cross-references to related subsections on automated documentation
Include migration guide for projects moving from single-version to multi-version docs
Document integration with Prodigy's automated documentation workflow
Add section on testing versioned documentation locally before deployment

metadata.validation_focus: Check documentation versioning documentation matches implementation
metadata.implementation_status: draft - all three specs are in draft status, no implementation exists yet
